div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(68, 68, 70); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Pengenalan Cryptocurrency

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Definisi: Wang digital sebagai medium pertukaran.

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Proses: Menggunakan prinsip kriptografi untuk keselamatan transaksi dan kawalan penciptaan duit syiling baru.

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Contoh: Bitcoin, Ethereum dll.

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Tujuan: Mengurangkan risiko yang terlibat dalam mata wang tradisional. Mudah diakses pada bila-bila masa dan di mana-mana sahaja.

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Cara Kerja: Menggunakan teknologi blockchain, maklumat pembeli dan penjual telus.

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Penciptaan: Kebanyakan melalui 'mining', sesetengahnya melalui teknik lain seperti token.

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Penukaran kepada wang tunai: Boleh ditukar melalui platform seperti Coinbase dan Kraken.

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 25px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Cryptocurrency & Metamask

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(68, 68, 70); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Metamask: E-Wallet

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Definisi: Dompet digital yang menyimpan kunci awam dan sulit (public & private keys).

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Jenis: Software Wallet (Desktop, Online, Mobile) dan Hardware Wallet (Device, Paper).

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Contoh Software Wallet: Coinbase Wallet, Trust Wallet, ZenGo.

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Contoh Hardware Wallet: Trezor, Ledger, KeepKey.

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Istilah: Public Key, Private Key, Keystore File, Phrase Mnemonic (Seed).

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Cara Kerja: Transaksi dicatatkan dalam blockchain, kunci sulit digunakan untuk mengesahkan identiti pemilik.

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Ciri-ciri Metamask: Open source, HD setting (Hierarchical Deterministic), Built-in coin purchasing (Coinbase, ShapeShift), antara muka yang mudah, penyimpanan kunci setempat.

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Kelemahan Metamask: Mudah hilang kunci sulit atau seed jika tiada sandaran, hanya menyokong penyimpanan 'hot storage'.

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Rangkaian yang disokong: Mainnet, Ropsten, Kovan, Rinkeby. Sumber data: Infura (Scalable Blockchain Infrastructure).

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Keselamatan: Kunci sulit hanya disimpan di pelayar, perlu mempercayai Infura.

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(39, 111, 134); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: E-Wallet

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(39, 111, 134); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Metamask

div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Helvetica Neue", "Source Han Sans SC", "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(39, 111, 134); white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: start

foreignObject.div: Cryptocurrency
